meanings.sent1: The wellspring of happiness for the family was spending time together.
meanings.sent2: The community garden was a wellspring of fresh vegetables for everyone.
meanings.sent3: The wellspring of jokes at the party kept everyone laughing all night.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was a wellspring that never ran dry, always ready to help others.
meanings.sent5: The library was a wellspring of knowledge, offering books on every subject imaginable.

meanings.definition: The original or ultimate source of something
meanings.sent1: The wellspring of the river was a small spring deep in the forest.
meanings.sent2: In the legend, the ancient tree was believed to be the wellspring of magic in the land.
meanings.sent3: The wellspring of creativity in her mind led to beautiful works of art.
meanings.sent4: His passion for music was the wellspring of his inspiration, composing melodies that touched hearts.
meanings.sent5: The wellspring of courage within her allowed her to face any challenge with determination.
